page.title: 17ABBOTS LEIGH SOCIETIES
page.content: CIVIC SOCIETY The society preserves the character and charm of Abbots Leigh and calls for increasing protection,and will only be maintained if we all support the activities being directed by various groups and individuals. Chairman-J.Cottrell Hon.Sec.C.Merriam WOMENS INSTITUTE They have 50 members.They meet in the village hall every second Tuesday.They celebrate their 47th.birthday this year.They meet from 7-30 to 9-30pm.At their meetings they talk about cookery,flower arranging,conservation ,health education,sport,countryside matters and history of people.They have fetes and jumble sales and meet at other Institutes.Once a year in June they go to London.They have 3 outings a year.They discuss religion and politics but not party politics.
